content: you ll love wearing the go with the flow super scarf it s so soft luxurios and has a great texture the scarf is worked lengthwise that means that the foundation chain will determine how long the scarf will be that also means that you will not have to turn your work hundreds of time dutch translation available here 1 enjoy **update 11/05/2016 ** now available a matching hat free pattern here **go with the flow hat** 2 **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 2 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 3 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 4 join our community of crocheters and have fun 2 http //www myhobbyiscrochet com/2016/11/go-with-flow-hat-free-crochet-pattern html 3 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 4 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 5 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/
